message: This is my first offer. I propose we divide the money with a 60/40 split in favor of me.
I'm not willing to give you 60. I'll give you 20, but I want more.
Considering the rejection and inflation, I propose a 50/50 split. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the reduced value of money.
I'll give you a slightly higher percentage, but I still think I deserve more. I'm willing to compromise, but not too much.
